structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.text:
As used in KRS 171.130 to 171.306, unless the context requires otherwise:
"Department" means the Department for Libraries and Archives;
"Public library" means a library which is established as the countywide library system by any of the methods provided by KRS Chapter 173; and
"Library materials" means those print, audiovisual, graphic, cartographic, machine readable, and manuscript materials provided by a library for its users.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VIII, B, sec. 1. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 157. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 106, Art. VIII, sec. 1.
